Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: For GenAI, it is better to ask [how to] rather than Why and What. Because you can easily check whether the results work. Besides, GenAI don't have wisdom, but some(not all) teacher have.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I don't worry about asking stupid question to GenAI, but if I ask such question to my lecturer or tutor, I do feel some pressure.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Usually I have a higher expectation to my teacher. I am not just learn knowledge from them, I also seek for insights and approval.
